::Kluster::

Kluster's frown could hardly be seen as he listens to Ice. She was 
obvioustly trying to hide something. Years of leading a Maximal group 
on various missions have taught Kluster to detect things like this, 
and having to fight against the Predacon empire allowed him to perfect 
that skill.

"What kinds of things do you want to know?" He asks, tapping a button. 
A piece of the table slides aside, revealing a screen. "Base 
positions, recent battles?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:

she wasn't

the game

recount,

a
